title: 2010 BH Telecom Indoors
text:
The 2010 <a href="BH%20Telecom%20Indoors">BH Telecom Indoors</a> was a professional <a href="tennis">tennis</a> tournament played on <a href="Tennis%20court%23Hard%20courts">indoor hard courts</a>. It was part of the <a href="2010%20ATP%20Challenger%20Tour">2010 ATP Challenger Tour</a>. It took place in <a href="Sarajevo">Sarajevo</a>, <a href="Bosnia%20and%20Herzegovina">Bosnia and Herzegovina</a> between 8 and 14 March 2010.

Singles.
 <a href="%C3%89douard%20Roger-Vasselin">Édouard Roger-Vasselin</a> def. <a href="Karol%20Beck">Karol Beck</a>, 6–7(5), 6–3, 1–0, ret.
Doubles.
 <a href="Nicolas%20Mahut">Nicolas Mahut</a> / <a href="%C3%89douard%20Roger-Vasselin">Édouard Roger-Vasselin</a> def. <a href="Ivan%20Dodig">Ivan Dodig</a> / <a href="Luk%C3%A1%C5%A1%20Rosol">Lukáš Rosol</a>, 7–6(6), 6–7(7), [10–5]
